The claim was originally made by Twitter: who tweeted images of a road and attributed it to the Modi government.
The images were widely circulated on soc: including Facebook pages known for spreading fake news.
Alt News: a fact-checking website, conducted a reverse image search and found that the photographs were actually from an Indonesian village and not from India.
Similar instances of misattributed image: where infrastructure developments from other countries were falsely claimed to be from India.
